description: Cleans the messy and sometimes incorrect JSON strings produced by LLMs so that they are fully compliant with the JSON spec.

inputs.name: json_str
inputs.info: The JSON string to be cleaned.

inputs.name: remove_control_chars
inputs.info: Remove control characters from the JSON string.

inputs.name: normalize_unicode
inputs.info: Normalize Unicode characters in the JSON string.

inputs.name: validate_json
inputs.info: Validate the JSON string to ensure it is well-formed.
